message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it will bring to you, I propose a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the standard price. I believe this is an opportunity not to be missed. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to proceed with the purchase.
